• 2+ years of experience designing and delivering products from start to finish as part of a cross-functional teamSolid understanding of user-centered design methods, processes, and best practicesDemonstrated desire and ability to continually improve through consistent collection of feedbackThe ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative, agile environment while producing great design work on tight deadlinesThe ability to explore ideas and build consensus on fast-moving projects with varying degrees of ambiguitySelf-motivation.
• Ability to produce results both independently and as part of a teamStrong communication and active listening skills, with an ability to build and develop close, trusting relationshipsExperience using multiple approaches, including analytics and user research, to drive decisions and develop product iterationsSolid knowledge of current design tools such as Figma, along with an ability to quickly learn new tools as they emergeA strong desire to design software that is global in reach, universal in design, and designed for users of multiple languages and abilitiesAn internal compass that points toward ethics and equality, and the conviction to speak up when we veer off courseBA/BS or MA/MS in a design-related field, or equivalent experience Work closely with product owners, other designers, engineers, and user research to understand our users, our business requirements, and craft and deliver designs that meet the needs of bothPrepare and deliver documentation, reviews, and presentations that communicate clear and compelling ideas to a wide range of key stakeholdersServe as a bridge connecting design, product, engineering, and marketing teamsCreate designs that adhere to and extend the existing style guide and/or design systemGenerate detailed final design specs that inspire accurate developer buildsWork with developers and quality experts to deliver a polished final productCreates inclusive designs for all users.

• AS+ in Engineering and 9+ years of related experience working as an HW test engineer or electrical technician in a product development lab.
• Strong Verbal and written communication skills - able to understand and record reports, procedures, and status updates Familiar with test equipment such as multimeters, oscilloscopes, spectrum analyzers, power supplies, signal generators Experience with Google Suite or MS office tools (Outlook/Excel/Word/PowerPoint/Project), familiarity with Jira a plus Provide technical expertise in problem analysis and solutions utilizing complex instrumentation and software.
• Experience designing and building mechanical fixtures and DUT holders in 3D CAD tool (eg, SolidWorks) Excellent problem-solving skills with a methodical approach to debugging and root cause analysis.
• Execute a variety of hardware tests including functional, performance, environmental (thermal, vibration, humidity), durability, and safety tests on vehicle components and subsystems (e.
• , ECUs, battery systems, steering systems, sensors, etc.
• Ability to read and understand electrical and mechanical engineering drawings, including schematics, layouts, wiring diagrams, and other technical documents.
• Familiarity with various communication protocols (e.
• , CAN, LIN, Ethernet) is a plus.
